title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8153.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8153.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) US Route 4. US
Route 4 between Route 197 in the Village of Fort Edward northerly and the State
of New York/State of Vermont line in the Villages of Fort Edward, Hudson Falls, Fort Ann and Whitehall and the Towns of Fort Edward, Kingsbury, Fort Ann, Whitehall and Hampton. (b) Route
22. Route 22 between the Essex County/Washington county line and Church Street
(CR 26) in the Villages of Granville and Whitehall and the Towns of Granville, Fort Ann, Whitehall, Dresden and Putnam. (c) Route 29. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 29 from Bio-Tech Mills, Inc. main entrance on the south side
of Route 29 (RM 1093+-) to the Washington-Saratoga county line in the Town and

Village of Greenwich and the Town of Easton, a distance of 9.5+-
miles. (d) CR 26 (Church Street)
between Route 22 and the Telescope Furniture Facility, a distance of 0.50+-
mile in the Village and Town of Granville. (f) Route 149. Route 149 between the Warren

County/Washington county line and US Route 4, in the Town and Village of Fort

Ann. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8153.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
